questions.text: What dorms do you have available?
questions.response: We have Sunset Dormitory, Downtown Dorm, Mountain View Dormitory, and Lakeside Dorm available.

questions.text: What are the prices for the dorms?
questions.response: Sunset Dormitory is $250/month, Downtown Dorm is $300/month, Mountain View Dormitory is $275/month, and Lakeside Dorm is $320/month.
Amenities include WiFi, laundry facilities, kitchens, gyms, and study lounges.
Currently, Sunset Dormitory has 5 rooms available, Downtown Dorm has 10 rooms available, Mountain View Dormitory has 8 rooms available, and Lakeside Dorm has 12 rooms available.
Yes, Mountain View Dormitory has free parking available.

questions.text: What is the nearest public transport?
questions.response: The nearest public transport is a bus stop located 5 minutes away from all dorms.

questions.text: Can I see the dorm before renting?
questions.response: Yes, you can schedule a visit to see the dorm before making any decisions.
Pets are not allowed in any of the dormitories.
Payments can be made via bank transfer, credit card, or cash.
We offer discounts for long-term stays and group bookings.
